author: bnicholes
msg: Removed the NetWare #ifdef's.  NetWare has its own version of filestat.c

author: bnicholes
msg: Removed global_mutex.c since global mutexes on NetWare have been
mapped to proc mutexes in apr_global_mutex.h.  Global mutexes on NetWare
are the same as proc mutexes and thread mutexes.
